CopyFileFromAppW: Copies an existing file to a new file.
CreateFile2FromAppW: Creates or opens a file or I/O device.
CreateFileFromAppW: Creates or opens a file or I/O device.
FindFirstFileExFromAppW: Searches a directory for a file or subdirectory with a name and attributes that match those specified.
GetFileAttributesExFromAppW: Retrieves attributes for a specified file or directory.
MoveFileFromAppW: Moves an existing file or a directory, including its children.
ReplaceFileFromAppW: Replaces one file with another file, with the option of creating a backup copy of the original file.
SetFileAttributesFromAppW: Sets the attributes for a file or directory.
